about.name: Atlanta
about.info_text: Atlanta, the capital of Georgia, is a vibrant and diverse city known for its rich history, cultural attractions, and southern hospitality. The city played a significant role in the civil rights movement and is home to landmarks like the Martin Luther King Jr. National Historic Site. Visitors can explore a variety of neighborhoods, each with its own unique character, and enjoy a thriving arts scene, exceptional dining, and a range of outdoor activities.
about.facts_text:
Population: Approximately 498,044
State: Georgia
Time Zone: Eastern Time Zone (UTC-05:00)
Languages: English
Currency: United States Dollar (USD)
about.climate_text: Atlanta has a humid subtropical climate with hot summers and mild winters. The city experiences occasional snowfall in the winter months.

attractions_card.alt: Martin Luther King Jr. National Historic Site
attractions_card.title: Martin Luther King Jr. National Historic Site
attractions_card.description: The historic site honors the life and legacy of Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. Visitors can explore his childhood home, the Ebenezer Baptist Church, and the King Center.

attractions_card.title: The Georgia Aquarium
attractions_card.description: One of the largest aquariums in the world, the Georgia Aquarium features a diverse range of marine life and offers educational programs and interactive exhibits.

attractions_card.title: Piedmont Park
attractions_card.description: Piedmont Park is a sprawling urban park in the heart of Atlanta, providing a scenic escape with walking trails, sports facilities, and cultural events.

attractions_card.title: The World of Coca-Cola
attractions_card.description: Explore the history of Coca-Cola at this interactive museum, featuring exhibits, a tasting room, and a chance to meet the Coca-Cola polar bear.

attractions_card.title: The Atlanta History Center
attractions_card.description: The Atlanta History Center offers a comprehensive look at the city's history, with museums, historic homes, gardens, and events.

attractions_card.title: The Fox Theatre
attractions_card.description: The Fox Theatre is a historic venue known for its stunning architecture and hosts a variety of performances, from Broadway shows to concerts.

attractions_card.title: The High Museum of Art
attractions_card.description: The High Museum of Art features an impressive collection of art, including European paintings, contemporary art, and special exhibitions.

attractions_card.title: The Atlanta Botanical Garden
attractions_card.description: The Atlanta Botanical Garden is a beautiful oasis with a variety of themed gardens, plant collections, and seasonal displays.

food_card.title: Southern Comfort Food
food_card.description: Indulge in classic southern dishes like fried chicken, biscuits, collard greens, and peach cobbler at local restaurants.

food_card.title: Barbecue
food_card.description: Atlanta is known for its barbecue, offering a range of styles, from tangy to smoky. Don't miss trying ribs, pulled pork, and brisket.

food_card.title: International Cuisine
food_card.description: The city's diverse culinary scene includes international cuisines such as Mexican, Ethiopian, Vietnamese, and more.

food_card.title: Farm-to-Table Dining
food_card.description: Enjoy fresh and locally sourced ingredients at farm-to-table restaurants, showcasing the best of Georgia's produce.

food_card.title: Craft Beer and Cocktails
food_card.description: Atlanta's craft breweries and cocktail bars offer a wide selection of locally brewed beers and creative mixed drinks.

hotels_card.title: The Ritz-Carlton, Atlanta
hotels_card.description: The Ritz-Carlton offers luxury accommodations with a central downtown location and top-notch amenities.

hotels_card.title: Four Seasons Hotel Atlanta
hotels_card.description: The Four Seasons Hotel in Midtown Atlanta provides elegance and comfort with spacious rooms and skyline views.

hotels_card.title: W Atlanta - Midtown
hotels_card.description: W Atlanta is a trendy hotel in the Midtown area, known for its modern design and vibrant atmosphere.

hotels_card.title: The Georgian Terrace Hotel
hotels_card.description: The Georgian Terrace is a historic hotel with a prime location near the Fox Theatre, offering classic charm and contemporary comforts.

hotels_card.title: The Westin Peachtree Plaza
hotels_card.description: The Westin Peachtree Plaza is a distinctive circular hotel with sweeping city views and a revolving rooftop restaurant.

hotels_card.title: Hotel Clermont
hotels_card.description: Hotel Clermont is a boutique hotel in the Poncey-Highland neighborhood, blending historic character with modern amenities.

hotels_card.title: JW Marriott Atlanta Buckhead
hotels_card.description: The JW Marriott in Buckhead offers luxurious accommodations, upscale dining, and a convenient location near shopping and dining.

hotels_card.title: The St. Regis Atlanta
hotels_card.description: The St. Regis is an opulent hotel in Buckhead, providing a refined experience with upscale dining and a beautiful pool.

transport_card.title: MARTA
transport_card.description: The Metropolitan Atlanta Rapid Transit Authority (MARTA) operates the city's subway and bus system, making it easy to get around.

transport_card.title: Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport
transport_card.description: Hartsfield-Jackson is one of the world's busiest airports, serving as a major transportation hub with domestic and international flights.

transport_card.title: Car Rentals
transport_card.description: Car rental agencies are available for those who prefer to explore Atlanta and its surrounding areas by car.

transport_card.title: Atlanta Streetcar
transport_card.description: The Atlanta Streetcar provides a convenient way to explore downtown Atlanta and its attractions.
